text_content: Different styles emerged in different areas

title: Delta Blues
text_content: Blues from the Mississippi delta is characterised by a distinct fingerpicking style and use of a slide

title: Piedmont Blues
text_content: East Coast or Piedmonte blues is a distinctive style with ragtime-style syncopation and technical way of playing.

title: Piedmont Blues
text_content: It had many successful proponents such as Blind Blake and Blind Boy Fuller

title: Hill Country Blues
text_content: Mississippi Hill Country blues comes from the Northern part of the Mississippi bordering Tennessee.

title: Hill Country Blues
text_content: It is characterized by a hypnotic rhythm few chord changes and simple structures
